Text:
Thank you! This had to be a massive undertaking and except for a few very minor spelling errors, produced an excellent book. I also like the fact that you synced the page numbers to the reader page number. I think this is the first ebook I've ever seen that this is true. Sure makes it easier to find what you want. 
You are wrong, though, when you say this book is a bit dated. It never will be. In fact, the better cook books are the older ones. Check out "Joy of Cooking." The 1975 version is the best. It was updated several years ago for "modern lifestyles" and a lot of the good stuff was left out and junk added. The 1975 classic was recently re-released. I'd like to acquire a hard copy and a digital copy of that one as my 1975 version is showing quite a bit of wear.
I wish this ebook had been smaller but don't get me wrong, I'm not complaining, I just wish it had been compressed more. 
BTW, what OCR program did you use and did it require much proofreading and correcting? I can't believe it has as few mistakes as it does.
Thanks again, I'm forever grateful.

Thanks for your hard work. Not many people go through the effort that you've done with this ebook, usually settling just for jpeg scans and leaving it at that. Although I'll probably just glance through this and never touch it again, I'm sure others with more enthusiasm toward cooking appreciate it.
A good cookbook is like giving a guy a fishing rod instead of a fish.
And what a labour of love you did on this book.  Julia would be proud!..and your grandmother.  Maybe they are together cooking up a meal in Heaven.

Thank you for this wonderful upload. Been harboring an interest in all things edible and was greatly inspired by Julie and Julia.

Bon appetit!
Thank you for all the time you must have spent on this.
Thanks you for all your hard work. You have everyone's gratitude for this massive and selfless undertaking.
Thank you for putting time into making an important book for everyone to read and learn. You are driving the philosophy of free information forward!
Thank you for your efforts in putting this together. What a great book that deserves to be in everyone's kitchen.
I loved Julie and Julia and am so grateful to you for making this book available. I live in France and have not been able to get a copy so this is perfect. Thank you
